snippet: In an open letter to Congress, more than 50 Nobel laureates said that pending cuts could endanger “the innovation engine that is essential to our economy.”
abstract: More than 50 Nobel laureates sign open letter urging Congress to spare federal science establishment from looming budget cuts, arguing that further reductions would endanger innovation that is essential to economy.
lead_paragraph: In an open letter to Congress, more than 50 Nobel laureates said that pending cuts could endanger “the innovation engine that is essential to our economy.”

headline.seo: Nobel Laureates Urge Congress Not to Cut Research Budget
headline.main: Laureates Urge No Cuts to Budgets for Research
headline.print_headline: Laureates Urge No Cuts To Budgets For Research

keywords.value: American Assn for the Advancement of Science
keywords.name: organizations
